title: How far can a gray wolf see around? - Quora

response.answer_text: “Wolves have keen eye sight and are quick to detect the slightest movement of anything in front of them. Being major predators, thier eyes are on the front of there heads, and they have probably a little less than 180-degree vision, unlike their prey species, which can see over 300 degrees of a circle” Wolf Country, facts, the senses observed
